Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I believe this is an exceptional opportunity for you. I kindly invite you to accept this offer at the same value, ensuring both parties benefit from this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
